config.stat.percent.tooltip: The percentage (0.05 = 5%) to increase Health, Damage, and Speed per Combat Level.
config.spawn.percent.tooltip: Chance (0.03 = 3%) per Combat Level to duplicate a monster when it spawns.
config.elite.chance.tooltip: Chance (0.01 = 1%) for a monster to become Elite.
config.elite.multi.tooltip: Multiplier (1.5 = 150%) applied to the already scaled stats for Elite monsters.
